azurerm_bot_channel_ms_teams.description: Manages an MS Teams integration for a Bot Channel

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Bot Channel. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

bot_name.description: The name of the Bot Resource this channel will be associated with. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

calling_web_hook.description: Specifies the webhook for Microsoft Teams channel calls.

enable_calling.description: Specifies whether to enable Microsoft Teams channel calls. This defaults to `false`.

id.description: The ID of the Microsoft Teams Integration for a Bot Channel.

create.description: Used when creating the Microsoft Teams Integration for a Bot Channel.

update.description: Used when updating the Microsoft Teams Integration for a Bot Channel.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Microsoft Teams Integration for a Bot Channel.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Microsoft Teams Integration for a Bot Channel.
